english.segment1: The TV said just make sure youre old enough. And let your feelings tell you when its right. What went wrong? She thought it was really love. Now she wonders why she just cant sleep at night. She knew the rules but they were too old fashioned. Was it worth the price she has to pay
english.segment2: Its either truth or consequences, theres no other way. Push truth aside, the other takes its place. Well, you can close your eyes but that wont make it go away. The truth or consequences must be faced
english.segment3: The headlines say our worlds in a lot of pain. Hurt from all the selfishness and greed. What went wrong? Like sheep all have gone astray. Well reap what we sow, dont be deceived. His truths been given and its there before us. Written on the page and in our hearts
